Articles.Content:
Stream is up again!

Come join us

Today, after spending literally 14 hours trying to get 4 "KegWays" connected to a rocket on the launch pad to take into orbit I have 2 of my own segways docked with the Firebad, and will be sending all 3 of my interplanetary ships to Jool!

as usual I will be taking time between my own launches to help people with their own ships. I really recommend you install the Kerbal Life Feed mod and join us on there, as its a great tool for sharing crafts and screenshots in Real Time!

Here is the KLF server we use!

klf.kerbalsp.com:2075

http://www.twitch.tv/HoYin1600p

Edited May 16, 2013 by HoY

Hi,

Kool ! So have I caught the streamin bug ! I hope to stream tonite !

Hey werent you in TS3 ?! I may catch up with ya !

Cdr Zeta

Stream is live again!

http://www.twitch.tv/HoYin1600p

Sending Big Bob, Big Bill, and the Firebat from Kerbin to Laythe shortly, just have a couple more little things to get into orbit with them

Stream is up again!

Come join us

Today, after spending literally 14 hours trying to get 4 "KegWays" connected to a rocket on the launch pad to take into orbit I have 2 of my own segways docked with the Firebad, and will be sending all 3 of my interplanetary ships to Jool!

as usual I will be taking time between my own launches to help people with their own ships. I really recommend you install the Kerbal Life Feed mod and join us on there, as its a great tool for sharing crafts and screenshots in Real Time!

http://www.twitch.tv/HoYin1600p

Are you planning on playing/streaming this Saturday?

I'm currently grounded from using electronics at home, but I should be able to get on KSP this weekend. I would certainly like to install LiveFeed and join you.

Edited May 16, 2013 by Jarod645
"Live", not "Life" iodfjsioagojlg
I will be back at work on saturday unfortunately
I wish twitch wasn't such a POS, I can never get it to work
yeah its being a pain for me right now too!
